text: Ara ye mahilaya grhe tini chilena se tamke kamana karala tamra antarangatara, ara bandha kare dile darajagulo o balale -- ''eso he tumi!’’ Tini balalena -- ''allah sahaya hona! Amara prabhu niscaya'i amara asrayasthala ati uttama baniyechena. Nihsandeha tini an'yayakaridera unnati karena na.’’
